mapper.select: select tc.id, u1.name as owner, tc.name, tc.website, tc.phone, u2.name as createBy, tc.createTime, u3.name as editBy, tc.editTime, tc.contactSummary, tc.nextContactTime, tc.description, tc.address from tbl_customer tc inner join tbl_user u1 on tc.owner = u1.id inner join tbl_user u2 on u2.id = tc.createBy left join tbl_user u3 on u3.id = tc.editBy
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_customer (id, owner, name, website, phone, createBy, createTime, editBy, editTime, contactSummary, nextContactTime, description, address) VALUES (#{id}, #{owner}, #{name}, #{website}, #{phone}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{editBy}, #{editTime}, #{contactSummary}, #{nextContactTime}, #{description}, #{address})
mapper.select: select tc.id, tu2.name as owner, tc.name, tc.website, tc.phone, tu1.name as createBy, tc.createTime, tu3.name as editBy, tc.editTime, tc.contactSummary, tc.nextContactTime, tc.description, tc.address from tbl_customer tc inner join tbl_user tu1 on tc.createBy = tu1.id inner join tbl_user tu2 on tc.owner = tu2.id left join tbl_user tu3 on tc.editBy = tu3.id where tc.name like '%' #{name} '%'
